verses.roman:
upāsanā lāgi' devera karena āvāhana
pūjā lāgi' kata kāla karena nirodhana

synonyms: upāsanā lāgi'-for worshiping the Deity; devera—of the Lord; karena āvāhana—invites to come; pūjā lāgi'-to perform the worship; kata kāla—for some time; karena nirodhana—He keeps the Deity.
translation: "Advaita Ācārya invites the Lord to come and be worshiped, and to perform the worship He keeps the Deity for some time.
